mdx.rawBody:
Song: Gangai nadhi
Film: Nyayam
singer : KJY SJ
Music : IR

Notes: s r1 g3 m1 p d1 n3 S

gangai nadhi meenO       mangai vizhi dhAnO
s  r   s n.srs  s (pgrs) s  r   s n.srs  s

angam yAvum thanga pALam
s r   g m   s   r  g m

pongi pAyum Asai vEgam thAna na na
s  r  g m   sr   g m   rm g  r  s

Stanza 1:
pAvai unai thazhuva   nenjil pAdal   malarudhadi
g mp  pp   p  p  dpmp p  p   p dpmpd p m m m  m gmpg

kAdhal ulagil mAlai mayakkam
gmgmp  mg rs  srrg  g m  mp

thaniyE yEnadi thayakkam
g  m mp mgr s  s  r  rg

vetkathukku vElai illai
m  g r   s  s n.  d.p.

pakkam vandhAl pAvam illai
m  g   r  s    s n.  d.p.

vAlibathin sandhaiyil vetkkam vilai pOgAdhu
m g r s    s  n.  d.  p.  d.  d.n.  n.ssrs

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
pAri vaLLaL thEr koduthAl pachai kodiyum padaradhO
anbu kOdiyum idam koduthAl micha kadhayum thodarAdhO
kai irandil idai kodiyAi thuvaLa
kani idhaz thEn thanni parugha
kOdi sugam konjatumE
koLLai inbam aLLatumE
uLLam konjam kenjatumE manmadha kalaigaL
